```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(here)
library(Stat2Data)
library(knitr)
library(leaps)
library(GGally)

Doctor <- read.csv(here("", "DoctorContacts.csv"))
Doctor <- as_tibble(Doctor)
Doctor

Doc_sample <- Doctor[sample(1:nrow(Doctor), 500,
   replace=FALSE),]

Doc_sample
```

\vspace{0.5cm}
```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = Doc_sample)

p + geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = mdu), bins = 50 )

model <- glm(mdu~health+physlim+ndisease+linc+educdec+age+sex, Doc_sample, family=poisson)
summary(model)
```
